verses.text_madani: ص ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ ذِي الذِّكْرِ
verses.translation: Suad, I swear by the Quran, full of admonition.

verses.text_madani: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ
verses.translation: Nay! those who disbelieve are in self-exaltation and opposition.

verses.text_madani: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوا وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ
verses.translation: How many did We destroy before them of the generations, then they cried while the time of escaping had passed away.

verses.text_madani: وَعَجِبُوا أَن جَاءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَٰذَا سَاحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ
verses.translation: And they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say: This is an enchanter, a liar.

verses.text_madani: أَجَعَلَ الْآلِهَةَ إِلَٰهًا وَاحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ عُجَابٌ
verses.translation: What! makes he the gods a single Allah? A strange thing is this, to be sure!

verses.text_madani: وَانطَلَقَ الْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ امْشُوا وَاصْبِرُوا عَلَىٰ آلِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ يُرَادُ
verses.translation: And the chief persons of them break forth, saying: Go and steadily adhere to your gods; this is most surely a thing sought after.

verses.text_madani: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي الْمِلَّةِ الْآخِرَةِ إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا اخْتِلَاقٌ
verses.translation: We never heard of this in the former faith; this is nothing but a forgery:

verses.text_madani: أَأُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ الذِّكْرُ مِن بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي شَكٍّ مِّن ذِكْرِي ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا عَذَابِ
verses.translation: Has the reminder been revealed to him from among us? Nay! they are in doubt as to My reminder. Nay! they have not yet tasted My chastisement!

verses.text_madani: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ الْعَزِيزِ الْوَهَّابِ
verses.translation: Or is it that they have the treasures of the mercy of your Lord, the Mighty, the great Giver?

verses.text_madani: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا فِي الْأَسْبَابِ
verses.translation: Or is it that theirs is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and what is between them? Then let them ascend by any

verses.text_madani: جُندٌ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِّنَ الْأَحْزَابِ
verses.translation: A host of deserters of the allies shall be here put to flight.

verses.text_madani: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو الْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: The people of Nuh and Ad, and Firon, the lord of spikes, rejected (messengers) before them.

verses.text_madani: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ الْأَحْزَابُ
verses.translation: And Samood and the people of Lut and the dwellers of the thicket; these were the parties.

verses.text_madani: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
verses.translation: There was none of them but called the messengers liars, so just was My retribution.

verses.text_madani: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَٰؤُلَاءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍ
verses.translation: Nor do these await aught but a single cry, there being no delay in it.

verses.text_madani: وَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: And they say: O our Lord! hasten on to us our portion before the day of reckoning.

verses.text_madani: اصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُودَ ذَا الْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: Bear patiently what they say, and remember Our servant Dawood, the possessor of power; surely he was frequent in returning (to Allah).

verses.text_madani: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا الْجِبَالَ مَعَهُ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِالْعَشِيِّ وَالْإِشْرَاقِ
verses.translation: Surely We made the mountains to sing the glory (of Allah) in unison with him at the evening and the sunrise,

verses.text_madani: وَالطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: And the birds gathered together; all joined in singing with him.

verses.text_madani: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُ وَآتَيْنَاهُ الْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ الْخِطَابِ
verses.translation: And We strengthened his kingdom and We gave him wisdom and a clear judgment.

verses.text_madani: وَهَلْ أَتَاكَ نَبَأُ الْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا الْمِحْرَابَ
verses.translation: And has there come to you the story of the litigants, when they made an entry into the private chamber by ascending over the walls?

verses.text_madani: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَىٰ دَاوُودَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَاحْكُم بَيْنَنَا بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَاهْدِنَا إِلَىٰ سَوَاءِ الصِّرَاطِ
verses.translation: When they entered in upon Dawood and he was frightened at them, they said: Fear not; two litigants, of whom one has acted wrongfully towards the other, therefore decide between us with justice, and do not act unjustly, and guide us to the right way.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّ هَٰذَا أَخِي لَهُ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِيَ نَعْجَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِي فِي الْخِطَابِ
verses.translation: Surely this is my brother; he has ninety-nine ewes and I have a single ewe; but he said: Make it over to me, and he has prevailed against me in discourse.

verses.text_madani: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ الْخُلَطَاءِ لَيَبْغِي بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَّا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُودُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّاهُ فَاسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ
verses.translation: He said: Surely he has been unjust to you in demanding your ewe (to add) to his own ewes; and most surely most of the partners act wrongfully towards one another, save those who believe and do good, and very few are they; and Dawood was sure that We had tried him, so he sought the protection of his Lord and he fell down bowing and turned time after time (to Him).

verses.text_madani: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
verses.translation: Therefore We rectified for him this, and most surely he had a nearness to Us and an excellent resort.

verses.text_madani: يَا دَاوُودُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَاكَ خَلِيفَةً فِي الْأَرْضِ فَاحْكُم بَيْنَ النَّاسِ بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ الْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ بِمَا نَسُوا يَوْمَ الْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: o Dawood! surely We have made you a ruler in the land; so judge between men with justice and do not follow desire, lest it should lead you astray from the path of Allah; (as for) those who go astray from the path of Allah, they shall surely have a severe punishment because they forgot the day of reckoning.

words.translation: for it will lead you stray

verses.text_madani: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاءَ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَاطِلًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنَ النَّارِ
verses.translation: And We did not create the heaven and the earth and what is between them in vain; that is the opinion of those who disbelieve then woe to those who disbelieve on account of the fire.

verses.text_madani: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ كَالْمُفْسِدِينَ فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الْمُتَّقِينَ كَالْفُجَّارِ
verses.translation: Shall We treat those who believe and do good like the mischief-makers in the earth? Or shall We make those who guard (against evil) like the wicked?

verses.text_madani: كِتَابٌ أَنزَلْنَاهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَارَكٌ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوا آيَاتِهِ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُولُو الْأَلْبَابِ
verses.translation: (It is) a Book We have revealed to you abounding in good that they may ponder over its verses, and that those endowed with understanding may be mindful.

verses.text_madani: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُودَ سُلَيْمَانَ ۚ نِعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: And We gave to Dawood Sulaiman, most excellent the servant! Surely he was frequent in returning (to Allah).

verses.text_madani: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِالْعَشِيِّ الصَّافِنَاتُ الْجِيَادُ
verses.translation: When there were brought to him in the evening (horses) still when standing, swift when running--

verses.text_madani: فَقَالَ إِنِّي أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ الْخَيْرِ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّي حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِالْحِجَابِ
verses.translation: Then he said: Surely I preferred the good things to the remembrance of my Lord-- until the sun set and time for Asr prayer was over, (he said):

verses.text_madani: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًا بِالسُّوقِ وَالْأَعْنَاقِ
verses.translation: Bring them back to me; so he began to slash (their) legs and necks.

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَانَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
verses.translation: And certainly We tried Sulaiman, and We put on his throne a (mere) body, so he turned (to Allah).

verses.text_madani: قَالَ رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَهَبْ لِي مُلْكًا لَّا يَنبَغِي لِأَحَدٍ مِّن بَعْدِي ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْوَهَّابُ
verses.translation: He said: My Lord! do Thou forgive me and grant me a kingdom which is not fit for (being inherited by) anyone after me;

verses.text_madani: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ الرِّيحَ تَجْرِي بِأَمْرِهِ رُخَاءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ
verses.translation: Then We made the wind subservient to him; it made his command to run gently wherever he desired,

verses.text_madani: وَالشَّيَاطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّاءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ
verses.translation: And the shaitans, every builder and diver,

verses.text_madani: وَآخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِي الْأَصْفَادِ
verses.translation: And others fettered in chains.

verses.text_madani: هَٰذَا عَطَاؤُنَا فَامْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
verses.translation: This is Our free gift, therefore give freely or withhold, without reckoning.

verses.text_madani: وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
verses.translation: And most surely he had a nearness to Us and an excellent resort.

verses.text_madani: وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ الشَّيْطَانُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ
verses.translation: And remember Our servant Ayyub, when he called upon his Lord: The Shaitan has afflicted me with toil and torment.

verses.text_madani: ارْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ
verses.translation: Urge with your foot; here is a cool washing-place and a drink.

words.translation: (is a spring) of water to bathe

verses.text_madani: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُ أَهْلَهُ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ
verses.translation: And We gave him his family and the like of them with them, as a mercy from Us, and as a reminder to those possessed of understanding.

verses.text_madani: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَاضْرِب بِّهِ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَاهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِّعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: And take in your hand a green branch and beat her with It and do not break your oath; surely We found him patient; most excellent the servant! Surely he was frequent in returning (to Allah).

verses.text_madani: وَاذْكُرْ عِبَادَنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَإِسْحَاقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُولِي الْأَيْدِي وَالْأَبْصَارِ
verses.translation: And remember Our servants Ibrahim and Ishaq and Yaqoub, men of power and insight.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّا أَخْلَصْنَاهُم بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى الدَّارِ
verses.translation: Surely We purified them by a pure quality, the keeping in mind of the (final) abode.

verses.text_madani: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ الْمُصْطَفَيْنَ الْأَخْيَارِ
verses.translation: And most surely they were with Us, of the elect, the best.

verses.text_madani: وَاذْكُرْ إِسْمَاعِيلَ وَالْيَسَعَ وَذَا الْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِّنَ الْأَخْيَارِ
verses.translation: And remember Ismail and Al-Yasha and Zulkifl; and they were all of the best.

verses.text_madani: هَٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
verses.translation: This is a reminder; and most surely there is an excellent resort for those who guard (against evil),

verses.text_madani: جَنَّاتِ عَدْنٍ مُّفَتَّحَةً لَّهُمُ الْأَبْوَابُ
verses.translation: The gardens of perpetuity, the doors are opened for them.

verses.text_madani: مُتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَاكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ
verses.translation: Reclining therein, calling therein for many fruits and drink.

verses.text_madani: وَعِندَهُمْ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ
verses.translation: And with them shall be those restraining their eyes, equals in age.

verses.text_madani: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: This is what you are promised for the day of reckoning.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُ مِن نَّفَادٍ
verses.translation: Most surely this is Our sustenance; it shall never come to an end;

verses.text_madani: هَٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّاغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَآبٍ
verses.translation: This (shall be so); and most surely there is an evil resort for the inordinate ones;

verses.text_madani: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ الْمِهَادُ
verses.translation: Hell; they shall enter it, so evil is the resting-place.

verses.text_madani: هَٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌ وَغَسَّاقٌ
verses.translation: This (shall be so); so let them taste it, boiling and intensely cold (drink).

verses.text_madani: وَآخَرُ مِن شَكْلِهِ أَزْوَاجٌ
verses.translation: And other (punishment) of the same kind-- of various sorts.

verses.text_madani: هَٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُّقْتَحِمٌ مَّعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُو النَّارِ
verses.translation: This is an army plunging in without consideration along with you; no welcome for them, surely they shall enter fire.

verses.text_madani: قَالُوا بَلْ أَنتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ الْقَرَارُ
verses.translation: They shall say: Nay! you-- no welcome to you: you did proffer it to us, so evil is the resting-place.

verses.text_madani: قَالُوا رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِي النَّارِ
verses.translation: They shall say: Our Lord! whoever prepared it first for us, add Thou to him a double chastisement in the fire.

verses.text_madani: وَقَالُوا مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ الْأَشْرَارِ
verses.translation: And they shall say: What is the matter with us that we do not see men whom we used to count among the vicious?

verses.text_madani: أَتَّخَذْنَاهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ الْأَبْصَارُ
verses.translation: Was it that we (only) took them in scorn, or have our eyes (now) turned aside from them?

verses.text_madani: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ النَّارِ
verses.translation: That most surely is the truth: the contending one with another of the inmates of the fire.

verses.text_madani: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَنَا مُنذِرٌ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا اللَّهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ
verses.translation: Say: I am only a warner, and there is no god but Allah, the One, the Subduer (of all):

verses.text_madani: رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفَّارُ
verses.translation: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and what is between them, the Mighty, the most Forgiving.

verses.text_madani: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَأٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: Say: It is a message of importance,

verses.text_madani: أَنتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.translation: (And) you are turning aside from it:

verses.text_madani: مَا كَانَ لِيَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ بِالْمَلَإِ الْأَعْلَىٰ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.translation: I had no knowledge of the exalted chiefs when they contended:

verses.text_madani: إِن يُوحَىٰ إِلَيَّ إِلَّا أَنَّمَا أَنَا نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Naught is revealed to me save that I am a plain warner.

verses.text_madani: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ إِنِّي خَالِقٌ بَشَرًا مِّن طِينٍ
verses.translation: When your Lord said to the angels; Surely I am going to create a mortal from dust:

verses.text_madani: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِي فَقَعُوا لَهُ سَاجِدِينَ
verses.translation: So when I have made him complete and breathed into him of My spirit, then fall down making obeisance to him.

verses.text_madani: فَسَجَدَ الْمَلَائِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
verses.translation: And the angels did obeisance, all of them,

verses.text_madani: إِلَّا إِبْلِيسَ اسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.translation: But not Iblis: he was proud and he was one of the unbelievers.

verses.text_madani: قَالَ يَا إِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَيَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ الْعَالِينَ
verses.translation: He said: O Iblis! what prevented you that you should do obeisance to him whom I created with My two hands? Are you proud or are you of the exalted ones?

verses.text_madani: قَالَ أَنَا خَيْرٌ مِّنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِي مِن نَّارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُ مِن طِينٍ
verses.translation: He said: I am better than he; Thou hast created me of fire, and him Thou didst create of dust.

verses.text_madani: قَالَ فَاخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ
verses.translation: He said: Then get out of it, for surely you are driven away:

verses.text_madani: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِي إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: And surely My curse is on you to the day of judgment.

verses.text_madani: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِي إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: He said: My Lord! then respite me to the day that they are raised.

verses.text_madani: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ الْمُنظَرِينَ
verses.translation: He said: Surely you are of the respited ones,

verses.text_madani: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ الْوَقْتِ الْمَعْلُومِ
verses.translation: Till the period of the time made known.

verses.text_madani: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: He said: Then by Thy Might I will surely make them live an evil life, all,

verses.text_madani: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except Thy servants from among them, the purified ones.

verses.text_madani: قَالَ فَالْحَقُّ وَالْحَقَّ أَقُولُ
verses.translation: He said: The truth then is and the truth do I speak:

verses.text_madani: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: That I will most certainly fill hell with you and with those among them who follow you, all.

verses.text_madani: قُلْ مَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ وَمَا أَنَا مِنَ الْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Say: I do not ask you for any reward for it; nor am I of those who affect:

verses.text_madani: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: It is nothing but a reminder to the nations;

verses.text_madani: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُ بَعْدَ حِينٍ
verses.translation: And most certainly you will come to know about it after a time.
